body_html:
@drpngx XLA is linked in at the moment, but it should not actually be doing anything in this test. The warning is benign and comes from device initialization. It should probably be lowered in severity; it just means you don't have a GPU, which this builder does not.

I think that test is simply flaky (it uses sleep() and expects a certain number of events to occur in a certain time). Perhaps XLA made something a touch slower, but perhaps not.

Either way I think @gunan is working on disabling XLA in the regular builds and adding a separate XLA-only build, which should fix any problems.
